The EP made history as the first of its format to debut at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 in its first week of sales. Hit tracks like "No Excuses," "I Stay Away," and "Nutshell", extended the group's popularity.[/woodmart_text_block][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][woodmart_list size="medium" list_type="without" woodmart_css_id="6878fa1c1d806" list="%5B%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A1.%20Steelheart%20Surge%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A2.%20Circuitry%20Carnage%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A3.%20Mechanized%20Mayhem%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A4.%20Cybernetic%20Chaos%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%5D" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2ODc4ZmExYzFkODA2Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfbGlzdCIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" css=".vc_custom_1752758816653{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][woodmart_list size="medium" list_type="without" woodmart_css_id="6878fa2262b24" list="%5B%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22B1.%20Metal%20Monstrosity%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22B2.%20Synthetic%20Slaughter%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22B3.%20Electro-Extermination%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%5D" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2ODc4ZmEyMjYyYjI0Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfbGlzdCIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" css=".vc_custom_1752758821703{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][woodmart_text_block woodmart_css_id="6878f9a07bbb5" woodmart_inline="no" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2ODc4ZjlhMDdiYmI1Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfdGV4dF9ibG9jayIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" parallax_scroll="no" wd_hide_on_desktop="no" wd_hide_on_tablet="no" wd_hide_on_mobile="no"]Alice in Chains acclaimed Jar of Flies is being reissued in celebration of its 30th anniversary. The EP made history as the first of its format to debut at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 in its first week of sales. Hit tracks like "No Excuses," "I Stay Away," and "Nutshell", extended the group's popularity.[/woodmart_text_block][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][woodmart_list size="medium" list_type="without" woodmart_css_id="6878fa1c1d806" list="%5B%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A1.%20Steelheart%20Surge%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A2.%20Circuitry%20Carnage%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A3.%20Mechanized%20Mayhem%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A4.%20Cybernetic%20Chaos%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%5D" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2ODc4ZmExYzFkODA2Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfbGlzdCIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" css=".vc_custom_1752758816653{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][woodmart_list size="medium" list_type="without" woodmart_css_id="6878fa2262b24" list="%5B%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22B1.%20Metal%20Monstrosity%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22B2.%20Synthetic%20Slaughter%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22B3.%20Electro-Extermination%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%5D" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2ODc4ZmEyMjYyYjI0Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfbGlzdCIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" css=".vc_custom_1752758821703{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][woodmart_text_block woodmart_css_id="6878f9a07bbb5" woodmart_inline="no" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2ODc4ZjlhMDdiYmI1Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfdGV4dF9ibG9jayIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" parallax_scroll="no" wd_hide_on_desktop="no" wd_hide_on_tablet="no" wd_hide_on_mobile="no"]Alice in Chains acclaimed Jar of Flies is being reissued in celebration of its 30th anniversary. The EP made history as the first of its format to debut at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 in its first week of sales. Hit tracks like "No Excuses," "I Stay Away," and "Nutshell", extended the group's popularity.[/woodmart_text_block][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][woodmart_list size="medium" list_type="without" woodmart_css_id="6878fa1c1d806" list="%5B%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A1.%20Steelheart%20Surge%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A2.%20Circuitry%20Carnage%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A3.%20Mechanized%20Mayhem%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22A4.%20Cybernetic%20Chaos%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%5D" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2ODc4ZmExYzFkODA2Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfbGlzdCIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" css=".vc_custom_1752758816653{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][woodmart_list size="medium" list_type="without" woodmart_css_id="6878fa2262b24" list="%5B%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22B1.%20Metal%20Monstrosity%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22B2.%20Synthetic%20Slaughter%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%2C%7B%22list-content%22%3A%22B3.%20Electro-Extermination%22%2C%22item_type%22%3A%22inherit%22%7D%5D" responsive_spacing="eyJwYXJhbV90eXBlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfcmVzcG9uc2l2ZV9zcGFjaW5nIiwic2VsZWN0b3JfaWQiOiI2ODc4ZmEyMjYyYjI0Iiwic2hvcnRjb2RlIjoid29vZG1hcnRfbGlzdCIsImRhdGEiOnsidGFibGV0Ijp7fSwibW9iaWxlIjp7fX19" css=".vc_custom_1752758821703{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
